name: Striker
overview: Introducing Striker, a football game with over 40 options and features ensuring your match is just how you like it! - Over 340 local and international teams - Team customization - 1 or 2 player - League tournament, World Cup or friendly matches - 6 or 11-a-side - Penalty shoot-out - Action replays - 8 formations - 3 angles of view - Controllable weather and terrain...and more!
